definitely give this account a follow, it’s really useful to get industry wide degen coverage like this

The Daily Edge: The Daily Edge 2.2.2024:
Posting this here because @beehiv has already shut down my newsletter after one post.
Solana memes got crushed today (not sure why), with HODL down 82%, WEN down 20%, MYRO down 41% and AMC down 35%.
articles.title: RT Pepper: definitely give this account a follow, it’s really useful to get industry wide degen coverage like this
